item.title: Build Interactive Dashboards With R Shiny
item.description: What is a Shiny App? The Shiny library helps you turn your analyses into interactive web applications without requiring HTML, CSS, or Javascript knowledge, and provides a powerful web framework for building web applications using R. Being able to create Shiny apps is a great skill to have because it enables you to communicate your insights to non-technical stakeholders and give them the tools to conduct their own analysis! Code Skeleton The skeleton of any Shiny app consists of a user interface (ui) and a server.
